Testi di Machine Learning liberi

Testi di Machine Learning liberamente disponibili su Internet

  • D. Barber. Bayesian Reasoning and Machine Learning

  • D. MacKay. Information Theory, Inference, and Learning Algorithms

  • T. Hastie, R. Tibshirani, J. Friedman. The Elements of Statistical Learning

  • K.P. Murphy. Machine Learning: a Probabilistic Perspective

  • K.P. Murphy. Probabilistic Machine Learning: an Introduction

  • AA.VV. Dive into Deep Learning

  • H. Daumé III. A Course on Machine Learning

  • A. Jung. Machine Learning: The Basics

  • Simon J.D. Prince. Understanding Deep Learning
